name: Lost Princess
description:
Story:


Play this FPS walking simulation where mission is to collect hidden items to get achievements. Main mission is to find missing Princess who are hidden somewhere in big open world. Player start his journey at small village and go through different places like graveyard and castle. So explorer big open world and forest and try to find all hidden objects

Features:

- lot of collectable items which gives steam achievements
- Relax and big world
